link_desc:
SNMP check for status of nodes, system and total disk space on NEC HYDRAstor storage device. Also get used space for filesystems.

SSH check for getting quota from device (SNMP does't have quota parameter) and create trigger for check if filesystem is close to quota.

Tested on zabbix 5.0, but should work on lower version, cause it's just SSH and SNMP checks.

Macros used to set WARN/CRIT percentages of space used and also for SSH user/pass to get quota from device.

UPD: Fixed trigger to discover correctly after adding new filesystem or renaming old ones.
author: Smirnov I.V.
